page.title: 11WESTHAVEN FARM, CARNOUSTIE
page.content: There is a fairly large, mainly {arable farm}in the area farmed by Mr.George McGill. He has{233 acres spread over 12 fields. He grows a wide variety of crops, including {peas, calabrese, cabbage {cauliflower, oats, wheat, barley}and {potatoes.} Occasionally Mr.McGill will get more than one crop from the same field in a year. This is possible when, after the early potatoes are lifted, he plants a crop of rape and rye grass in the same field. The{farm buildings}are over{200 {years old.} The soil on the farm ranges from sand in the fields near the beach to a medium loam in the fields farthest from the beach with a range of sandy loam in between.
